mainengine

Interface DistanceHistogramGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BhattacharyyaHandler

    public interface DistanceHistogramGenerator
    The Interface DistanceHistogramGenerator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Double> generateDistanceArray(java.util.LinkedList<org.opencv.core.Mat> histCollection)
      Generate distance array from a collection of histograms, which in this context should represent a frame each histogram.

    • Method Detail

      • generateDistanceArray

        java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Double> generateDistanceArray(java.util.LinkedList<org.opencv.core.Mat> histCollection)
        Generate distance array from a collection of histograms, which in this context should represent a frame each histogram. If the histogram collection's size is n, the distance collection's size should be n-1. The distance calculation can be implemented with different methods, such as Bhattacharyya. The histograms MUST HAVE the same number of bins and values within the range [0,1]
        Parameters:
        histCollection - Collection of histograms, which represent in this context a collection of histograms of the h channel of hsv frames.
        Returns:
        the linked list, or collection of distance between each histogram.
        See Also:
        Comparación de histogramas
